projects.title: TicTacToe Game

projects.title: BizForge Website

about.main: I’m Apeksha Verma, a passionate Front-End Developer and Software Developer. With 4 years of experience in crafting responsive web applications and optimizing databases, I blend design precision with technical expertise to deliver seamless digital experiences.
about.journey: B.C.A. graduate from Invertis University, currently pursuing an M.C.A. at Chandigarh University. I blend front-end development and software engineering to craft innovative, user-focused solutions.
about.passion: Over the past few years, I’ve immersed myself in front-end development and software engineering, creating scalable solutions and solving real-world challenges. I’m driven by the goal of making a meaningful impact through technology.
about.connect: Explore my portfolio and let’s connect for collaborations!
